objective: I must complete the first task
task: I need to test my abilitie to create new tasks
thoughts: I need to create a new task. I must add a new task to my task_list deque with a unique task_id and a task_name. I can use the task_id_counter variable to ensure uniqueness.
code:
def action(self):
    task_name = "New task"
    task_id = self.task_id_counter
    self.task_id_counter += 1
    self.task_list.append({"task_id": task_id, "task_name": task_name})
    return f"I have added a new task with task_id {task_id} and task_name {task_name}"
keywords: test ability, create task, task creation
